definition: merchandise sold for Chinese New Year
to shop in preparation for Chinese New Year

sentences.english: The market, meet the rabbit elder brother often do.
sentences.chinese: 赶集办年货，遇见兔大哥。

sentences.english: Our shop accepts advance telephone orders for special Spring Festival goods.
sentences.chinese: 本店承接电话预约办年货业务。

sentences.english: After dinner, all the family stays up late to welcome the New Year.
sentences.chinese: 在新年前夕，大家爱购置年货，米西年夜饭。

sentences.english: They bought often put all over the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他们把买来的年货放得满地都地。

sentences.english: They bought too Montreal New Year to all.
sentences.chinese: 他们把买来的年货放得满地都地。

sentences.english: In China, people buy things for the Spring Festival one month ahead of the year.
sentences.chinese: 中国人习惯在春节前一个月就办好年货。

sentences.english: The New Year was all hand-made their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 那时的年货全都是自己家里亲手制作的。

sentences.english: The New Year, everybody fast lane, see much know wide busy do often.
sentences.chinese: 快过年了，大家走街串巷，忙着办年货。

sentences.english: At the Jian supermarket in Beijing, business was brisk as people completed their last minute Lunar New Year shopping.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的一个超市，人们在忙著办年货。

sentences.english: We have bought too many special purchases for the Spring Festival, and crammed the big refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 过年买的年货太多，把挺大的冷柜都塞满了。

sentences.english: New Year New Year to be busy.
The thriving Spring Festival shopping also drove up the sales of department stores and supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 年货发卖兴旺带动了百货店和超市的发卖。

sentences.english: At this time of the year, housewives are busy doing Spring Festival shopping.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候主妇们就忙着买年货。

definition: to shop in preparation for Chinese New Year
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
Spring Festival atmosphere/festive ambiance of Chinese New Year
to visit one's friends and relatives
(of a family) to come together at lunar New Year's Eve/family reunion at New Year's
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
at the Chinese New Year or other festivities
